Manga de Tokiakasu Hannya Shingyou no Nazo Gen

description.en: The manga artist who brought popular manga such as "8 Man'', "Moonlight Mask'', and "Phantom Detective'' to the world depicts the mysterious world of the Heart Sutra in an easy-to-understand and fun manga!In recent years, he has turned his attention to the spiritual world and continues to explore new fields through meditation. It is Jiro Kuwata's life work and the culmination of his life. This is an introductory book that allows anyone to understand the meaning, wisdom, and profound world of each letter of the Heart Sutra, using the medium of manga to express it more deeply. Since you can learn everything from the basics of Buddhist terminology such as the Kannon Sutra, the Eightfold Path, Para Mitta, the Five Aggregates, and the 12 Causes to the deep world of understanding, this book is perfect for both those who have been frustrated by difficult sutras and those who are starting to learn.
